SEARCH
Package com.app.converter.many

Interface ProductsConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductsConverterImpl
public interface ProductsConverter
Interface for converting a list of Product entities to their corresponding ProductDto representations and for performing other conversion tasks related to products and statistics.

This interface provides methods to convert Product entities to DTOs, generate product statistics, and map between different representations of products.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<GroupByDto<Integer,ProductDto>>
    ageAndMostProductDto(Map<Integer,List<Product>> map)
    Converts a map of product ages to the most popular products into a list of GroupByDto objects.
    List<CategoryAndPriceStatisticDto>

    Converts a map of product categories and associated statistics to a list of CategoryAndPriceStatisticDto objects.

    toDtoList(List<Product> products)
    Converts a list of Product entities to a list of ProductDto objects.
    List<Product>

    Converts a list of ProductEntity objects to a list of Product objects.
    List<ProductEntity>
    toProductEntities(List<ProductDto> products)
    Converts a list of ProductDto objects to a list of ProductEntity objects.

  • Method Details

    • toDtoList

      List<ProductDto> toDtoList(List<Product> products)
      Converts a list of Product entities to a list of ProductDto objects.
      Parameters:
      products - the list of Product objects to convert
      Returns:
      a list of ProductDto objects representing the products

    • categoryAndPriceStatisticDto

      List<CategoryAndPriceStatisticDto> categoryAndPriceStatisticDto(Map<String,Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>> priceStatistic)
      Converts a map of product categories and associated statistics to a list of CategoryAndPriceStatisticDto objects.
      Parameters:
      priceStatistic - a map of product categories and their corresponding statistics
      Returns:
      a list of CategoryAndPriceStatisticDto objects representing the price statistics

    • toProductEntities

      List<ProductEntity> toProductEntities(List<ProductDto> products)
      Converts a list of ProductDto objects to a list of ProductEntity objects.
      Parameters:
      products - the list of ProductDto objects to convert
      Returns:
      a list of ProductEntity objects representing the products

    • ageAndMostProductDto

      List<GroupByDto<Integer,ProductDto>> ageAndMostProductDto(Map<Integer,List<Product>> map)
      Converts a map of product ages to the most popular products into a list of GroupByDto objects.
      Parameters:
      map - a map where the key is the product age and the value is a list of popular products
      Returns:
      a list of GroupByDto objects representing products grouped by age

    • toProduct

      List<Product> toProduct(List<ProductEntity> productEntities)
      Converts a list of ProductEntity objects to a list of Product objects.
      Parameters:
      productEntities - the list of ProductEntity objects to convert
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects representing the products
